tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages

definition.text: We are a few steps away from being able to fully test the first trading idea! You need to learn a thing or two first!

paragraphs.text: In the third tutorial in the series, we covered the definitions and nuances of the Trigger Stage.
In this tutorial, we will complete the basic definitions of the rest of the stages so that we may finally test our hypothesis!
I highly recommend you do the first three tutorials in the series before doing this one! The story is carried from one to the next!
